text: All are elegible to go to pugatory
Only those who brewed tea mindfully go to paradise
All those who brewed tea angry go to hell
All those who drank ice tea go to hell
Only those who shared the first sip with someone go to paradise
All those who denied to share the first sip go to hell
Only those who shared second sip, not first, go to purgatory
Only those who drank the tea extremely hot are brought back to life
All those who drank the tea cold go to hell
Only those who drank lukewarm tea go to purgatory
Only those who reflected on life with a cup of tea once a week go to paradise
Only those who reflected on life with a cup of tea more than once a week are reincarnated
All those who don't reflect at all during the week go to hell.
All those who threw away tea leaves go to hell.
Only those who bury the leaves in nature go to paradise.
Only those who burn the leaves and throw the ashes into the wind are reincarnated.
All those who reuse the tea leaves and brew another tea with them go to hell.
All are elegible to go to pugatory
Only those who carry the Cosmic Snail trinket go to paradise.
All those who don't carry any Cosmic Snail trinker go to hell.
Only those who carry more than one Cosmic Snail trinket are brought back to life.
All those who are running go to hell.
All those who move fast, but are not running go to purgatory.
Only those who move slow go to heaven.
Only those who move extremely slow, in a snail-like pace, are brought back to life.
All those who stop only once a day to notice something tiny and beautiful go to purgatory.
Only those who stop more than once a day to notice something tiny and beautiful go to paradise.
All those who don't stop at all to notice something tiny and beautiul go to hell.
All those who harm snails go to hell.
All those who don't protect small creatures when seeing them in need, go to purgatory.
Only those who protect small creatures when seeing them in need, go to paradise.
All are elegible to go to pugatory
Only those who laugh daily go to paradise.
All those who fake to laugh or giggle go to purgatory.
All those who don't try to laugh or giggle go to hell.
All those who only share mean and cruel jokes go to hell.
Only those who share generous jokes go to paradise.
All those who share generous and mean jokes go to purgatory.
All those who are serious all the time go to hell.
Only those who are serious only once a week go to paradise.
All those who are not serious at all, even once a week go to purgatory.
Only those who aren't afraid to cry go to paradise.
All those who aren't crying at all go to purgatory.
All those who try to hold back crying go to hell.
All those who see a star and make a wish, without laughing after it, go to purgatory.
Only those who see a star, make a wish and laugh after it go to paradise.
All those who see a star and don't make a wish at all, go to hell.
All are elegible to go to pugatory
Only those who light a candle or a lamp at dawn and dusk everyday go to paradise.
All those who light a candle or a lamp at dawn or at dusk everyday go to purgatory.
All those who don't light the lamp or a candle everyday go to hell.
All those who lie in darkness go to hell.
Only those who lie with some type of light go to paradise.
Only those who help others see light when they're lost are reincarnated.
All those who don't help others see the light when they're lost go to purgatory.
Only those who release their doubts on new moon go to paradise.
All those who release their doubts on other phases of the moon go to purgatory.
All those who don't release their doubts at all at any moon phases go to hell.
All those who blow out the flame with thier breath go to hell.
Only those who blow out the flame with a gentle snuff go to paradise.
All those who let the flame being blown out naturally by air are brought back to life.
